name: pufferfish
dialogue: Hey, you look like a standup guy, so I'm gunna give you some advice.
You're gunna wanna take a right here, then a left, then another left, and after that, another left.
Then what you're gunna wanna do is you're gunna wanna take another left, then take a right, and just keep going.
Trust me, my man, you'll find something really cool, heh heh heh.
